title: Communicative Skills English (B2)
ziele:
This course is designed to help students

  • develop and practice language learning skills
  • develop and practice social skills
  • develop and practice oral communication skills for business and studies
  • develop and practice written communication skills for business and studies
  • read and discuss different types of texts for business and studies
  • produce different types of texts for business and studies
  • become sensitive to concepts of language register and appropriacy
  • revise and develop their language level in all four skills areas
lehrinhalte:
Skills and language focus

  • Reading and listening for gist and details
  • Note-taking
  • Summarizing
  • Vocabulary building
  • Grammar revision
  • Pronunciation
  • Informal and formal writing (language and conventions)
  • Evaluation of resources
  • Discussion and negotiation
  • Problem-solving
  • Data interpretation
  • Presentation
  • Self-assessment
  • Teamwork
  • Peer evaluation and feedback

Topics

  • Developing a Learning Plan and Package
  • Personal Profile and CV
  • Current events
  • Political, economic, and social issues
  • Getting your point across in presentations and writing
  • Agreeing and disagreeing
  • Debating
  • Dilemma-solving and decision-making
  • Interpreting and evaluating data/sources
beurteilung:
• 100% attendance and active participation in English
  • Completion of assigned tasks for meetings
  • Four assessed writing assignments
  • Two mid to end of semester in-class written assessments (45 mins each)
  • Course Portfolio
  • Final Interview

The final grade in this course consists of your portfolio, including assigned written work, and in-class assessments (50%), oral work in class and a final interview (50%).
Please note that both your written and oral work must be positive to complete the course.
